entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: SW 45 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
